THE SUBSCRIBER wishes to sell the Gristl
anl Saw Mills, situated at the head of Morsan's
Greek, Kent County, Md. about five miles from
Ca.stertown. This very valuable property will
snil to good purchaser, such terms as will Sc
cure the amount of the purchase, an interest, IT
sha property be rented from ten to twelve per cent
per annum.


During the last and the present year the Grist
Mill has been well repaired on the improved plan
otcast iron cog wheels, working into avery large spur
wheel: and every part of the running gears, water
wheel and great frame, husk, as it is called, has
been made entirely new, within IA few months past,
and also, pier head or iore-bay, boiling cloth and
gears are new and of the best quality-the mill is
making some of the best meal and Hour in Kent
County. The stream which said mills are built
is far superior to any in Kent County, SO much so
that grain at this very dry season sent to her from
l5 to 90 miles, and at all seasons an excellent sup
ply of country custom is offered, and the water
power is sufficient to do merchant work and manl-
iaciuring Of different kinds very extensive
scale. The Saw Mill is in very good order and
cnn be very proitably employed until Il drought
prevails. The Dam and Flood Gates are in good
order.

THE SUBSCRIBER wishes to sell the Gristl
anl Saw Mills, situated at the head of Morsan's
Greek, Kent County, Md. about five miles from
Ca.stertown. This very valuable property will
snil to good purchaser, such terms as will Sc
cure the amount of the purchase, an interest, IT
sha property be rented from ten to twelve per cent
per annum.


During the last and the present year the Grist
Mill has been well repaired on the improved plan
otcast iron cog wheels, working into avery large spur
wheel: and every part of the running gears, water
wheel and great frame, husk, as it is called, has
been made entirely new, within IA few months past,
and also, pier head or iore-bay, boiling cloth and
gears are new and of the best quality-the mill is
making some of the best meal and Hour in Kent
County. The stream which said mills are built
is far superior to any in Kent County, SO much so
that grain at this very dry season sent to her from
l5 to 90 miles, and at all seasons an excellent sup
ply of country custom is offered, and the water
power is sufficient to do merchant work and manl-
iaciuring Of different kinds very extensive
scale. The Saw Mill is in very good order and
cnn be very proitably employed until Il drought
prevails. The Dam and Flood Gates are in good
order.

full articles.headline: THE Terms Of Sale
full articles.article:
are, that the purchaser pay the first day of Ja-
nuary 1898, $500, and the balance ofthc purchase
money in six semi-annual payments Any person
wishing to purchase will please view the property,
which will be shown to them by my miller, in my
absence from home. Possession may be had imme-
diately, or whenever the property is sold. IT it
should not be sold by the first Monday in October,
it will then be offered at Public SALE at 10 o'clock
A. NJ. at Mr.. Money tavern in Chestertown.
good and sufficient deed will be given to the pur-
chaser when the property shall be paid for. Any
further information relative to said property can be
had by applying to the subscriber on the premises,
or through the Post Office Chestertown.


JAMES HANSON.


Aug. II, 1927. 37--Gt
